docs.snippet: A senior North Korean delegation left Pyongyang on Friday to attend the inauguration of Nicaragua's newly elected President Daniel Ortega....

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission filed a lawsuit against D-Link Corp on Thursday, accusing the Taiwan-based manufacturer of failing to take reasonable steps to protect its routers and internet-linked security cameras from hackers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission filed a lawsuit against D-Link Corp on Thursday, accusing the Taiwan-based manufacturer of failing to take reasonable steps to protect its routers and internet-linked security cameras from hackers.

headline.main: U.S. Sues D-Link, Alleges Lax Security in Routers, Cameras
headline.print_headline: U.S. Sues D-Link, Alleges Lax Security in Routers, Cameras

docs.snippet: China’s toxic air has drawn attention to a Chinese surgeon’s poem that takes the viewpoint of a hungry lung cancer reveling in the “delicious mist and haze.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: China’s toxic air has drawn attention to a Chinese surgeon’s poem that takes the viewpoint of a hungry lung cancer reveling in the “delicious mist and haze.”

headline.main: A Poem Praises Smog, and Why Not? It’s From Cancer’s Perspective

docs.snippet: Russell Westbrook repeatedly had his way with the Rockets defense, torching it to the tune of a Toyota Center scoring record for an opponent before three late misses set the table for James Harden to play the role of facilitator at the most opport...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook repeatedly had his way with the Rockets defense, torching it to the tune of a Toyota Center scoring record for an opponent before three late misses set the table for James Harden to play the role of facilitator at the most opportune time for Houston.

headline.main: Harden Gets Last Laugh as Rockets Top Thunder
headline.print_headline: Harden Gets Last Laugh as Rockets Top Thunder

docs.snippet: In a sign of improving cooperation between the U.S. and China to fight the global drug trade, the Drug Enforcement Administration will open a new office there and its top chief will visit next week for the first time in more than a decade....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a sign of improving cooperation between the U.S. and China to fight the global drug trade, the Drug Enforcement Administration will open a new office there and its top chief will visit next week for the first time in more than a decade.

headline.main: DEA Opens Shop in China to Help Fight Synthetic Drug Trade
headline.print_headline: DEA Opens Shop in China to Help Fight Synthetic Drug Trade

docs.snippet: The death toll in protests and looting fueled by anger over gasoline price hikes in Mexico rose to six Friday when authorities confirmed that two men died in a confrontation between protesters and police in the central state of Hidalgo....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death toll in protests and looting fueled by anger over gasoline price hikes in Mexico rose to six Friday when authorities confirmed that two men died in a confrontation between protesters and police in the central state of Hidalgo.

headline.main: Looting, Protests in Mexico Over Gas Price Hikes Turn Deadly
headline.print_headline: Looting, Protests in Mexico Over Gas Price Hikes Turn Deadly

docs.snippet: An influential Chinese state-run tabloid has chided the New York Times over its reporting practices after Apple Inc removed the newspaper's app from its China app store at the request of the Chinese government....
docs.lead_paragraph: An influential Chinese state-run tabloid has chided the New York Times over its reporting practices after Apple Inc removed the newspaper's app from its China app store at the request of the Chinese government.

headline.main: China State Tabloid Scolds New York Times for Investigative Reports
headline.print_headline: China State Tabloid Scolds New York Times for Investigative Reports

docs.snippet: Colin Munro became the third New Zealand player to score a Twenty20 international century as his side secured a 47-run victory and wrapped up their three-match series against Bangladesh with a game to spare on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colin Munro became the third New Zealand player to score a Twenty20 international century as his side secured a 47-run victory and wrapped up their three-match series against Bangladesh with a game to spare on Friday.

headline.main: Munro Ton Helps NZ Clinch Bangladesh T20 Series
headline.print_headline: Munro Ton Helps NZ Clinch Bangladesh T20 Series
